Cowed down by paramount pressure of academics Unable to handle it and need a gush of fresh 
 
air Well, we provide you the perfect platform and golden opportunity to rack your brains and prove 
 
your mettle in a different arena -the world of quizzing. An intriguing battle await as we expect full 
 
participation from all the budding quizzers with a true spirit of sportsmanship. 
 
The event QUIZZARD is an open quiz event. 
 
Rules and Regulations: 
 
 THERE CAN BE MAXIMUM 3 MEMBERS IN EACH TEAM. 
 
 6 TOP-SCORING TEAMS OF THE PRELIMS ROUND WILL BE SELECTED TO COMPETE IN 
 
THE FINALS TO BE HELD ON THE SAME DAY.
